title: Enhancing Software Development Practical Competencies: Emotion-Based Foreign Language Speaking Proficiency Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic foreign language (Mandarin Chinese) communication skills and digital device usage experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can maintain low anxiety levels while communicating with native speakers using emotional learning strategies
Learners can explain mathematical concepts in the target language during role-play scenarios lasting over 10 minutes
Learners can improve speaking performance by over 20% based on feedback collected through digital platforms
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
